item.text: If a homicide victim should be found lying in a field in the land the Lord your God is giving you, and no one knows who killed him,

your <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> and <st data-num="08199" class="">judges</st> must <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st> and <st data-num="04058" class="">measure</st> how far it is <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> <st data-num="0834 05439">in the vicinity of</st> the <st data-num="02491" class="">corpse</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="01961" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="07138" class="">nearest</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02491" class="">corpse</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> from the <st data-num="01241" class="">herd</st> a <st data-num="05697" class="">heifer</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="05647" class="">worked</st>—<st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="04900" class="">pulled</st> with the <st data-num="05923" class="">yoke</st>—

and <st data-num="03381" class="">bring</st> the <st data-num="05697" class="">heifer</st> <st data-num="03381" class="">down</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="05158" class="">wadi</st> with <st data-num="0386" class="">flowing water</st>,<n id="1" /> to a valley <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="03808" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="05647" class="">plowed</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="02232" class="">sown</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08033" class="">There</st> at the <st data-num="05158" class="">wadi</st> they are to <st data-num="06202" class="">break the</st> <st data-num="05697" class="">heifer’s</st> <st data-num="06202" class="">neck</st>.
Then the Levitical priests will approach (for the Lord your God has chosen them to serve him and to pronounce blessings in his name, and to decide every judicial verdict) ,

and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> of <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="07138 0413">nearest</st> the <st data-num="02491" class="">corpse</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="07364" class="">wash</st> their <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="05697" class="">heifer</st> whose <st data-num="06202" class="">neck was broken</st> in the <st data-num="05158" class="">valley</st>.<n id="2" />

Then they must <st data-num="06030 0559">proclaim</st>, “Our <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08210" class="">spilled</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> have <st data-num="05869" class="">we</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07200" class="">witnessed</st> the crime.<n id="2" />
Do not blame your people Israel whom you redeemed, O Lord, and do not hold them accountable for the bloodshed of an innocent person.” Then atonement will be made for the bloodshed.
In this manner you will purge the guilt of innocent blood from among you, for you must do what is right before the Lord.
When you go out to do battle with your enemies and the Lord your God allows you to prevail and you take prisoners,

if you should <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> among <st data-num="07633" class="">them</st><n id="1" /> an <st data-num="03303 08389">attractive</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> whom you <st data-num="02836" class="">wish</st> to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> as a <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>,

you may <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> her back <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> your <st data-num="08432 01004">house</st>. She must <st data-num="01548" class="">shave</st> her <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06213" class="">trim</st> her <st data-num="06856" class="">nails</st>,

<st data-num="05493 05921">discard</st> the <st data-num="08071" class="">clothing</st> <st data-num="07633" class="">she was wearing when captured</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03427" class="">stay</st><n id="2" /> in your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="01058" class="">lamenting</st> for her <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st> for a <st data-num="03117" class="">full</st> <st data-num="03391" class="">month</st>. <st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">that</st> you may <st data-num="0935" class="">sleep</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> her<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="01167" class="">become</st> her <st data-num="01167" class="">husband</st> and <st data-num="01961" class="">she</st> your <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>.
If you are not pleased with her, then you must let her go where she pleases. You cannot in any case sell her; you must not take advantage of her, since you have already humiliated her.
Suppose a man has two wives, one whom he loves more than the other, and they both bear him sons, with the firstborn being the child of the less-loved wife.

In the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> he <st data-num="05157" class="">divides</st> his <st data-num="01121 0834 01961">inheritance</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="03201" class="">must</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01060" class="">appoint as firstborn</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of the <st data-num="0157" class="">favorite wife</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">place of</st> the <st data-num="08130" class="">other wife’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> who is actually the <st data-num="01060" class="">firstborn</st>.

Rather, he must acknowledge the son of the less-loved wife as firstborn and give him the double portion of all he has, for that son is the beginning of his father’s procreative power—to him should go the right of the firstborn.
If a person has a stubborn, rebellious son who pays no attention to his father or mother, and they discipline him to no avail,

his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st> must <st data-num="08610" class="">seize</st> him and <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> him <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02205 05892">elders</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> of his <st data-num="04725" class="">city</st>.

They must <st data-num="0559" class="">declare</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st><n id="1" /> of his <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, “Our <st data-num="01121 02088">son</st> is <st data-num="05637" class="">stubborn</st> and <st data-num="04784" class="">rebellious</st> and <st data-num="08085" class="">pays</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">attention</st> to <st data-num="06963" class="">what</st> we <st data-num="06963" class="">say</st>—he is a <st data-num="02151" class="">glutton</st> and <st data-num="05433" class="">drunkard</st>.”
Then all the men of his city must stone him to death. In this way you will purge wickedness from among you, and all Israel will hear about it and be afraid.
If a person commits a sin punishable by death and is executed, and you hang the corpse on a tree,

his body must not remain all night on the tree; instead you must make certain you bury him that same day, for the one who is left exposed on a tree is cursed by God. You must not defile your land that the Lord your God is giving you as an inheritance.
